Reviews.Title: Unlocked my butt
Reviews.Author: Tania Mattson
Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad because the seller said it was unlocked and I could use it with any phone carrier...we'll I have Verizon and I went to add this device to my plan and they could not do it...it has to be one of their iPads...so I am displeased about that.  Other than that, I love my ipad...I can do so many things with it and it is more portable than my computer!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Easily handling, very fashionable, simple for using. I loved and strongly recommended!!!!! I haven't regret myself bying the mini instead the normal iPad.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with this one
Reviews.Author: isableandaking
Reviews.Content: It's an iPad Mini. It's Apple. What more is there to say ? Amazing design, amazing feeling, limited usability, but works great for parents and grandparents.

Reviews.Title: everything in one
Reviews.Author: geri fried
Reviews.Content: love it.....everything you could ever want or need, all in one.....phone, computer , information !  Never have multiple devices again

Reviews.Title: It's Apple the name says it all
Reviews.Author: J. Dominique Andre "Dominique Andre"
Reviews.Content: i am a fan of apple but i didn't buy this for myself, it was a gift to my mother...( i prefer android because of the FREEDOM)... she is loving the ipad mini...in terms of stability hands down they do have that.
